title: Home - American AVK
text: Welcome to AVK Valves and fire hydrants from American AVK lead the industry in quality and service, guaranteed. From our 10-year warranty on valves and hydrants to our next-day parts delivery guarantee, we back every product with exceptional support. We build each product with unmatched quality, innovation and value. AVK: The name you'll want to remember. 130 AVK employees throughout North America 180,000 Square feet of our manufacturing center in Minden, NV 6 Average number of days from purchase order to shipment 3 distribution centers in the US, shipping stocked items in under 24 hours
